snippet.title: Fallen Legion Revenants - Character Trailer (PS4, Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ https://fallenlegiongame.com/revenants

Lucien will stop at nothing to take down the mad tyrant Ivor...even if his choices will alter the fates of everyone around him. Harness cunning and guile in Fallen Legion Revenants, and manipulate the events within Welkin Castle to your favor!

Coming to Nintendo Switch and PS4 in 2021.

#FallenLegion #NISAmerica #YummyYummyTummy
